Text: please do not download this, audio is out of sync, and those who already downloaded, please watch in vlc player and put 8 sec in audio sync settings

thanks a lot... its a/v/9/10 ... 1 point minus for audio as it requires synchronization.. but download a software called "MKVToolnix " from http://www.softpedia.com/get/Multimedia/Video/Other-VIDEO-Tools/MKVToolnix.shtml   or just google it... and then after installing, input the movie.mkv file u want to syncronize...then go to "format specific options" and i wrote 7900 ms there and then just click Start Muxing... n u r done!! dvd quality print..thanks again
